alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 9:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Flagler, St. Johns, northeastern Marion, Putnam and east central Clay Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 935 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near George`s Lake to 6 miles west of Salt Springs. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Green Cove Springs, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings and East Palatka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay; Western Putnam
